text.caption: Tanque de Armazenamento Espuma Concentrada para o Helideck

caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
Are you sure you want to perform this action?

animateColor.expression: If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 500))) Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 750))) Then 1 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 1000))) Then 2 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 500))) Then 3 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 750))) Then 4 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 1000))) Then 5 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) == 0)) Then 6 Else 7
If {#1.Sts.Falha} Then 0 Else If ((NOT {#1.Sts.Falha}) AND {#1.Sts.Desligado}) Then 1 Else If ((NOT {#1.Sts.Falha}) AND {#1.Sts.Ligado}) Then 2 Else 3

animateColor.expression: If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 500))) Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 750))) Then 1 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 1000))) Then 2 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 500))) Then 3 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 750))) Then 4 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 1000))) Then 5 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) == 0)) Then 6 Else 7
